question: 白黒
sourceMnemonic: Something is both <kanji>white</kanji> and <kanji>black</kanji>. It is <vocabulary>black and white</vocabulary> (you can also say <vocabulary>white and black</vocabulary> if you prefer).
sourceReadingMnemonic: The readings are kun'yomi, but you should have seen both <ja>白</ja> and <ja>黒い</ja> separately as vocabulary by now. It's the same readings here, so you can apply that knowledge and read this word!
